title: Nano Bullet
summaries: The Nano Bullet is a Hardmode, post-Plantera type of bullet and is one of six types of craftable ammunition made from Empty Bullets, which are sold by the Arms Dealer after Hardmode has been enabled. It will inflict struck enemies with the Confused debuff, which causes them to have their movement reversed, running away from the player rather than towards them. Nano Bullets have the second highest base damage of all bullets, tied with Venom Bullets and beaten out by Luminite Bullets.

(Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) If a Nano Bullet hits a solid block, it will ricochet off it in the direction of the closest enemy, but will only deal 66% damage afterward. Nano Bullets can only ricochet once.
The cost of a stack of 50 Nano Bullets is 17 SC50 CC, which is 35 CC per bullet. The cost of crafting 1000 Nano Bullets (20 stacks of 50) is 3 GC50 SC.

statistics.Damage: 15 (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) / 10 (Old-gen console and 3DS versions) (Ranged)
statistics.Tooltip: Causes confusion and bounces back after hitting a wall
statistics.Sell: 8 CC
